modName: Apollo. a silly npc with strange fetish. (wip)
summary: Apollo (from greek mythology) is a npc who sucks a profound amount of cock.
descriptionHtml:
Apollo (from greek mythology) is a npc who sucks a profound amount of cock.  He isn't custom voiced but he would probably not say anything intelligent anyway as he is to busy being comfortable with a mouth full of dick.  

This is a mod that is a work in progress and only intended for people who are very comfortable with a lot of dick.
If it is not your thing then don't download it, I just want to be clear of what this mod intends to do as I continue working on it. 

For now I'm modifying the sneak animation so he can crouch down into a bush full of sausage and chug chug chug.   This is a long way from being completed and if anyone wants to help set up Apollos quest or offer Apollo any help in his dick ducking endeavor please let me know in the comments.

I wouldn't normally upload until the animation is more completed and the quest is working but the files are here as a starting place.

This is free for anyone to use as a resource in case you want to pass this cocksucker around.. Be my guest and spread the word of Apollos single skill as he nears completion. I do request this stay a Nexus exclusive release though.
author: iamawesome
